LanguageData.PauseDebug.Description: If enabled, the mod will output debugging information to the log.
LanguageData.PausePredator.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a predator chooses to attack a colonist or tamed animal.
LanguageData.PausePredatorLetter.Description: If enabled, the mod will send a letter (the notifications on the right-side of the screen) when a predator is attacking a tamed animal.
LanguageData.PauseFoodBinge.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes on a food binge.
LanguageData.PauseInsulting.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes on an insulting spree.
LanguageData.PauseCorpseObsession.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist tries to haul a corpse to a public area.
LanguageData.PauseSadisticRage.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist attacks a prisoner.
LanguageData.PauseBerserk.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes berserk.
LanguageData.PauseCatatonia.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes into a catatonic state.
LanguageData.PauseGaveUp.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist gives up on the colony.
LanguageData.PauseJailBreak.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist stages a prison break.
LanguageData.PauseMurderousRage.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes on a murderous rage.
LanguageData.PauseRunWild.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist runs wild.
LanguageData.PauseSlaughter.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist goes on a slaughter spree.
LanguageData.PauseConfusion.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist enters a confused state.
LanguageData.PauseSocialFight.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a colonist starts a social fight.
LanguageData.PauseTransportCrash.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a transport pod crash occurs.
LanguageData.PauseMaddened.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a mad animal event occurs.
LanguageData.PauseIdle.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a pawn is idle.
LanguageData.PauseIdleDelay.Description: The amount of time, in hours, between the previous pause and the next pause. Once this time has elapsed, the mod will pause the game if another pawn is idle.
LanguageData.PauseIdleJoy.Description: If enabled, the mod will attempt to pause the game when a pawn is idle. Idle joy occurs when pawns have recreational activities they can do, and no queued work.
LanguageData.PauseIdleJoyDelay.Description: The amount of time, in hours, between the previous pause and the next pause. Once this time has elapsed, the mod will pause the game if another pawn is idle.
LanguageData.PauseIdle.LetterText: {0} is currently idle.\n\nYou should consider giving them something to do.
